channel.title: Nedd epic help! (most coders Cant help me)
channel.description:
Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 2 at net.com.pulsepk.model.Player.loadCharacter(Player. java:5627) at net.com.pulsepk.net.codec.RS2LoginProtocol.login(R S2LoginProtocol.jav a:160) at net.com.pulsepk.Engine.connectAwaitingPlayers(Engi ne.java:330) at net.com.pulsepk.Engine.run(Engine.java:207) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)
ight this is the error i get sometimes basicly it keeps the server online but in a state tht people cant connect to it... so my uptime stays up but i lose players so id greatly love if someone could help me i have a 508/525 if u could help plz do add my email at Tattooboy241@live.com
plz help me plz!

item.title: Nedd epic help! (most coders Cant help me)
item.dc:creator: @greenishscape greenishscape
item.description:
@greenishscape wrote:

i did look in player.java i dnt know how to fix it can someone plz show me how? or just tell me what to do plz

i looked for loadCharacter in player.java only has two results and here it is

public String newPassword = “”;
public void loadCharacter() {
String s = “”;
String s1 = “”;
String s3 = “”;
String as[] = new String[3];
boolean flag = false;
boolean newFile = false;
int i = 0;
BufferedReader reader = null;
try {
reader = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("./data/characters/mainsave/" + username + “.dat”));
}
catch (FileNotFoundException filenotfoundexception) {
playerLoaded = true;
password = newPassword;
saveCharacter();
System.out.println("New player registered: " + username);
newFile = true;
playerLoaded = false;
//return;
}
if (newFile) {
loadCharacter(); // Loop back and start the loading again
return;

so anyoen actually kind and or smart enough to help us?

Read full topic
item.source: Nedd epic help! (most coders Cant help me)

im not trying to be a smart*** but if james cant help you, as-well as these other pro coders i see, it might just be a good idea to get a new source lol.
[/quote]No its not that its just the simplest thing ever.[/quote]o lol i didnt look at it i just assumed you all meantit wus hard but when i looked at it i lol’d my dik off. no offense kid but if u cant get past this “error” u might as well give up now or get sum frikin 30 page java tuts lolz cuz u might need em.
